nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Drifting satellite ahead, partially encased in crystalline void matter. Power trace is near zero.

choices.text: [Engineering] Salvage carefully for fuel and parts.
Force salvage. We need supplies now.
Scan first. Look for traps or transmissions.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: We bypassed the crystal veins and secured the fuel cells. Minimal contamination detected.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Pry successful, but the lattice sang. Residual hum detected in the cargo bay.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: There’s a data ping repeating an old fleet checksum. I’ve captured it—could be coordinates or a warning.
